entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:23 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, 10.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 10:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: 10.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 42 %

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
